snippet: Jeremy Lin and Landry Fields debuted a new handshake this week that appears to be a nod to the fact that they both attended hallowed educational institutions.
abstract: Jeremy Lin and Landry Fields debuted a new handshake this week that appears to be a nod to the fact that they both attended hallowed educational institutions.
lead_paragraph: The most highly educated backcourt in the N.B.A. revealed perhaps the nerdiest handshake in league history this week.

headline.main: Nerdy Greeting Really a Smart Shake
